title: John

properties.name: description
properties.value: John is part of the crew that players take during the Bone Voyage quest. After the quest, he can be found sleeping on a bench in the Museum Camp on Fossil Island.

NPC ID7765,7790

John is part of the crew that players take during the Bone Voyage quest. After the quest, he can be found sleeping on a bench in the Museum Camp on Fossil Island.
